about_the_game:
Are you ready to explore a whimsical, hand-drawn world, full of unexpected surprises?

  • Adventure through the first two chapters of the Box Dog saga.
  • Each chapter contains nine levels with extremely hard to find hidden objects.
  • To move on to each new level you have to find eight mischievous Imps.

Box Dog is a classic hidden object game at heart, with each meticulously crafted level featuring stunning visuals and surprises at every turn. Progress through the game, and you'll be captivated by the enchanting Overneath. Each level is a vibrant masterpiece, rich in color and detail. Keep an eye out for hidden clues and Easter eggs scattered throughout the game.

However, don't be deceived by the beauty of Box Dog. Completing the game is very difficult. It will take some time to guide Joget and Box Dog to safety. Can you find the keys to help them escape each level?

As you immerse yourself in the Box Dog you'll uncover the deeper meaning behind their quest. Themes of friendship, courage, and the journey of life itself are intricately woven into the game's fabric, leaving a lasting impression long after the final level.

So, what are you waiting for? Join Joget and Box Dog on their magical journey today!
